execute:
  daemon: 3600

julia:

mainfont: Lato
fontsize: 11pt

format:

    documentclass: report
    number-sections: true
    number-depth: 2
    crossref:
      chapters: true
      fig-prefix: "Figure"
      sec-prefix: "Section"
    include-in-header: header/header.tex
    filters:
      - header/revision-filter.lua
    monofont: JuliaMono
    monofontoptions: "Scale=0.75"
    papersize: A4

header-includes:
  - \def\companyName{Agilitus Qld}
  - \def\logoCompany{C:/Users/Josua/Juliarepo/agilitex_header/images/logo-agilitus.png}
  - \def\client{Client}
  - \def\logoClient{images/logo-client.png}
  - \def\projNo{25xxx}
  - \def\projTitle{Title}
  - \def\calcNumber{25xxx-ST-CAL-000y}
  - \def\calcTitle{Engineering check calculation}
  - \def\projPhase{Detailed Design}

revisions:

    revDate:
    revDesc:
    revAuthor:
    revCheck:
    revApp:

    revDate: 15/01/25
    revDesc: IFIR
    revAuthor: Josua A.
    revCheck: x.y.
    revApp:
